name: 5x7 Custom Portrait
description:
Take a treasured photo of your child or other loved one and capture that moment in a carefully hand crafted 5x7 charcoal drawing.

This product in particular is designed for closeup shots of your family members as shown in the examples.

The price includes a black 6x8 frame, ready to hang right out of the box!

Shipping cost is not included, shipping will be determined at checkout based on your location.

Once you have made your purchase, I will notify you with directions on how to receive your photo.

Please note that a portrait of this detail will take up to 18 days for me to complete. If this is for a gift for a holiday or special celebration, please plan accordingly.


REBATE:  For a limited time I am offering a $5.00 rebate, for positive testimonials of your experience through the portrait process as well as your feelings about the final product.  These testimonials will be displayed on this and my other websites.  You will receive your rebate, once I receive your testimonial!

name: 8x10 Custom Portrait
description:
Take a treasured photo of your child or other loved one and capture that moment in a carefully hand crafted 8x10 charcoal drawing.

The price includes a black 11x13 frame, ready to hang right out of the box!

Shipping cost is not included, shipping will be determined at checkout based on your location.

Once you have made your purchase, I will notify you with directions on how to receive your photo.

Please note that a portrait of this detail will take up to 30 days for me to complete.  If this is for a gift for a holiday or special celebration, please plan accordingly.


REBATE:  For a limited time I am offering a $5.00 rebate, for positive testimonials of your experience through the portrait process as well as your feelings about the final product.  These testimonials will be displayed on this and my other websites.  You will receive your rebate, once I receive your testimonial!
